extendedInfo.description: Painting and Sketching helps your kids to develop creativity skills. It is also beneficial in the development of learning skills for the preschool kids. Lion Coloring Book application will let your kids do free hand painting as they like.Your kids will enhance their creativity skills and learn how to make color schemes. Lions are considered to be one of the dangerous animals and kids usually get scared of them. Lion Coloring Book will let your kids come out of their scare and play with lions and fill them with different colors.Lion Coloring Book app has high quality images and sketches like Lions, Tigers and Cheetahs. Lionâs images are ready to be filled with colors. Funny faces and images make it comfortable and enjoyment for kids.Your toddlers can use their fingers to paint the images with the help of brushes in different sizes. Now you can use to fingers and paint in the images. With the new eraser tool you can even delete the unwanted paint that you mistakenly have filled. Kids choose colors from a good range of colors. Kids start to develop a sense of creating things their own way.***Top Features***â A wide range of colors available.â Different brush sizes to use while painting.â Eraser tool helps to remove the messed up colors.â You can even save your painted images in your SD card.So get Lion Coloring Book on your smart phones and let your kids have a try at developing their creativity skills while they play with different lions.***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: Big cats coloring
reviews.comment: I do not like how there is only one color.
reviews.author: Bruce Harpster
